GSP28jsbh3-3u:832_1: ṣṭhani” tipaṭhitasūtravihitaṣṭhanpratyayāntatvena vyutpādanaṃ somanāthena kṛtaṃ tadeva yuktam /

GSP28jsbh3-3u:857: nanu prāptabādhe sāmānyaśāstrādinā prāptasya kathaṃ bādhaḥ?
GSP28jsbh3-3u:858: nahyatra nedaṃ rajatamityādivat mithyātvarūpo bādhaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP28jsbh3-3u:860_0: yaditu karaṇaniṣṭhadoṣābhāve 'pi vastutaḥ karaṇe viśeṣātiriktaviṣayakatvena vidyamāne
GSP28jsbh3-3u:865: kadācit kalpitāyā api tasyāḥ pratyakṣaśrutyā mithyātvasyaiva kalpanācca /
GSP28jsbh3-3u:868: yenaca padaśāstrameva prathamato dṛṣṭam tasya padavidhānena sāmānyaśāstreṇa bhramāsaṃbhavānna viśeṣadarśanāt tannivṛttiḥ viśeṣādarśanābhāvena bhramakāraṇābhāvāt /
GSP28jsbh3-3u:869: ataeva tadā sāmānyaśāstraṃ tadvyatiriktaviṣayatāṃ jhaṭityeva pratipadyate /
GSP28jsbh3-3u:870: yenatu sāmānyeśāstraṃ pūrvamākalitaṃ tasya sāmagrīsattvādutpannasya bhramasya viśeṣadarśanānnivṛttiḥ;
GSP28jsbh3-3u:873_0: nanu ------ evaṃ tarhi yatra “na tau paśau karotī“tyatra bādha eva śāstrārthastatra
GSP28jsbh3-3u:874_0: tasmāt śāstraprāptaniṣedhe pramārūpāyā eva prāpterabhyupeyatvāt ataeva tādṛśasthale
GSP28jsbh3-3u:874_1: mīmāṃsakaiḥ vikalpāṅgīkārāt kathaṃ prāptavādhatvāvacchedena prāpakaśāstrasya bādhakaśāstreṇa
GSP28jsbh3-3u:874_2: svaviṣayakatāpratibandhena tallakṣaṇasaṃbhava ityāśaṅkāṃ nirasitumāha ------ evaṃ yatrāpīti //
GSP28jsbh3-3u:876_0: yato 'tra pramārūpaiva prāptiḥ ataeva vikalpāṅgīkārāt yasmin pakṣe ājyabhāgayorabhāvaḥ
GSP28jsbh3-3u:876_1: tasmin pakṣe niṣedhaśāstrasya tadupajīvyatvena tatpratibandhakatvāsaṃbhave 'pi sāmānyaśāstrasya
GSP28jsbh3-3u:877: nanu anayā rītyā viśeṣaśāstreṇa bādhe 'pi sāmānyaśāstrataḥ pramārūpaprāptimādāya vikalpāpattirityata āha ------- yathāceti //
GSP28jsbh3-3u:880: balavadaniṣṭānanubandhitvajñānasya pravṛttiṃprati pratibandhakatvakalpanena tadabhāvasyaiva tatkāraṇatva kalpanayā pravṛttyupapatteḥ tadasaṃbhavāt /
GSP28jsbh3-3u:881: yatratviṣṭasādhanatvāṃśe pramājanakatvaṃ tasya niṣedhāvagatāniṣṭasādhanatvena virodhābhāvādeva na tadaṃśe bādhakatvam /
GSP28jsbh3-3u:882: yā tu tatra sāmagrīsattve pravṛttiḥ sā sāmagryabhāve paraṃ na jāyate iti daivavaśasaṃpannaṃ niṣedhasya bādhakatvaṃ rāgaprāptaniṣedhasthale iti na vikalpaḥ /
GSP28jsbh3-3u:884: niṣedhe tu prāpterupajīvyatvānna bhramatvamiti vikalpa ityarthaḥ //
GSP28jsbh3-3u:885: evaṃ śrutyādīnāṃ parasyaiva daurbalyam pūrvasya prābalyam /

GSP28jsbh3-3u:1309_2: sarvathā pūṣāṅgapeṣaṇasya bādhaprasaṅgādardhapeṣaṇaṃ yuktamityeva prayojanaṃ kāṃsyabhojinyāyopapādanenāśrayaṇīyamiti
GSP28jsbh3-3u:1311: iti śrīmatpūrvottaramīmāṃsāpārāvārīṇadhurīṇa kavimaṇḍana-khaṇḍadevaśiṣya-śaṃbhubhaṭṭaviracitāyāṃ bhāṭṭadīpikāvyākhyāyāṃ prabhāvalyāṃ tṛtīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //
